main event: Civilians observed a silvery white unidentified object hovering and moving back and forth before shooting up into the sky.
interesting points: The sighting occurred while driving at about 100 mph during a picnic trip., The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes before it shot away., The altitude of the object was reported to be about 1000 feet., The reported shape of the object was undetermined., The location of the sighting was about 24 miles south of Ely, Nevada.
witness description: Two civilians, a husband and wife, were the witnesses.
